locale.title: Call of tea bag night
locale.subtitle: Yes that is the title
locale.tutorial_move: Touching the left part of the screen controls your movement.
locale.tutorial_look: Touching the right part of the screen controls where you look.
locale.tutorial_ghost: As a ghost you need to find a body to drive. Navigate to a knocked out body.
locale.tutorial_attack: Touching the middle part of the screen controls your attacks.
locale.tutorial_proximity: Move near items to interact and pick up. Look for a frying pan.
locale.hint_0: When in a body, tap movement to jump.
locale.hint_1: When in a body, hold move to crouch.
locale.hint_2: Swirl your attack for increased strength.
locale.hint_3: Tea bag a knocked out opponent to get things.
locale.hint_4: Each opponent type gives a different type of item when tea bagged.
locale.legal: This work has been prepared by David Coen, who releases any and all claims to any or all design, concept, implementation therein. This work is not suitable for public release, containing uncredited texture images used as placeholder content during development.
